thread.title: New voting machines in the Congo could cause 'chaos'

title: New voting machines in the Congo could cause 'chaos'
text:
New voting machines in the Congo could cause 'chaos' Saturday, March 10, 2018 - 02:00 
When election officials unveiled voting machines that resemble large tablet computers in Democratic Republic of Congo, they hailed them as the solution to a multitude of problems. But, opponents fear the machines will lead to fraud and chaos.   
When election officials unveiled voting machines that resemble large tablet computers in Democratic Republic of Congo, they hailed them as the solution to a multitude of problems. But, opponents fear the machines will lead to fraud and chaos.  //reut.rs/2IdQjJE
